review:
Example & Associates are the best in the valley, they’re not like most Injury Attorneys in the valley who will see you as a pay check and try to rush you out the door without getting you the proper help after your accident .They actual take the time to update you every step of the way on your case, also not mention they’ll send you to some great specialist for your recovery . I can assure you you’d be in great hands with them

Also shout out to the one of the associates Aileen who was a godsend for handling my case with care and professionalism.
